En.WIGGLYTUFF_PA1_TEXT_1: When hit by an enemy attack at close range, make that enemy infatuated for a short time. Infatuated enemies become enthralled and approach Wigglytuff against their will. This ability goes on a 10s cooldown when triggered.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and stunning them for 0.5s when it hits.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_POUND_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff slaps the area in front of them twice (.3s apart), damaging enemies in a cone and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DOUBLE_SLAP_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff unleashes a barrage of slaps, damaging enemies in a cone 3-5 times and slowing them by 45% for 1.5s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff emits a flash of fairy energy, dealing a small amount of damage in a cone after 0.6s followed by a large amount of damage.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_2: Slows enemies hit by the first flash by 40% for 1s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff gains a 25% max HP shield for 0.5s and rolls forward a short distance, throwing enemies hit in the air for 0.5s. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_ROLLOUT_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff gains a 25% max HP shield for 2.5s and rolls forwards. Wigglytuff becomes unstoppable for the duration of the roll, damaging and throwing Pokémon hit in the air for 0.5s. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving up to 5 times and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, and Dazzling Gleam. Also, the shield refreshes duration each time an obstacle is hit.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_ROLLOUT_TEXT_2: Increases the amount of time enemies are thrown in the air to 0.7s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_SING_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff begins singing, slowing enemies around them by 10% for 2s per "Note" and increasing Wigglytuff's movement speed by 30% for 2.5s. Enemies that stay inside the song's effect will be put to sleep (when reaching 4 Notes) for 1.5s, and have their Defense and Special Defense reduced by 25% for 1.25s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_SING_TEXT_2: Increases the amount of time enemies are asleep to 1.75s and the duration of Defense and Sp. Defense to 1.5s.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_STARLIGHT_RECITAL_TEXT_1: Begin performing a recital and become unstoppable for 3s, granting Wigglytuff and nearby allies a shield for 2.5s as well as removing all status conditions from the affected allies and granting them immunity to hindrances for as long as the shield is active.
En.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_STARLIGHT_RECITAL_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_PA1_TEXT_1: 近距离被敌人攻击命中时，使该敌人短时间陷入迷魂状态。痴迷的敌人变得着迷并违背他们的意愿接近 Wigglytuff。此技能触发后有 10 秒的冷却时间。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_BA1_TEXT_1: 每三次攻击变为一次增幅攻击，对敌人造成伤害并在命中时使敌人昏迷0.5秒。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_POUND_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 两次拍击他们前方的区域（相隔 0.3 秒），对锥形范围内的敌人造成伤害并使其减速 40%，持续 0.5 秒。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DOUBLE_SLAP_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 释放一连串的巴掌，对锥形范围内的敌人造成 3-5 次伤害，并使他们减速 45%，持续 1.5 秒。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 发出一道闪光的精灵能量，在 0.6 秒后在锥形范围内造成少量伤害，随后造成大量伤害。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_2: 使第一道闪光击中的敌人减速 40%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_DEFENSE_CURL_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 获得 25% 的最大 HP 护盾，持续 0.5 秒，并向前滚动一小段距离，将击中的敌人抛向空中，持续 0.5 秒。翻滚时撞到障碍物会改变 Wigglytuff 的移动方向，并重置重击、双拍或炫光的冷却时间。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_ROLLOUT_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 获得 25% 的最大 HP 护盾，持续 2.5 秒并向前滚动。Wigglytuff 在翻滚期间变得势不可挡，对击中的神奇宝贝造成伤害并将其投掷到空中 0.5 秒。翻滚时撞到障碍物最多会改变 Wigglytuff 的移动方向 5 次，并重置重击、双拍和炫目闪光的冷却时间。此外，每次击中障碍物时，护盾都会刷新持续时间。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_ROLLOUT_TEXT_2: 将敌人被抛向空中的时间增加到 0.7 秒。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_SING_TEXT_1: Wigglytuff 开始唱歌，每个“音符”使周围的敌人减速 10%，持续 2 秒，并使 Wigglytuff 的移动速度提高 30%，持续 2.5 秒。留在歌曲效果内的敌人将陷入睡眠（达到 4 个音符时）1.5 秒，并在 1.25 秒内降低其防御和特防 25%。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_SING_TEXT_2: 将敌人的睡眠时间增加到 1.75 秒，并增加防御和 Sp 的持续时间。防御到1.5s。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_STARLIGHT_RECITAL_TEXT_1: 开始朗诵并变得势不可挡，持续 3 秒，为 Wigglytuff 和附近的盟友提供 2.5 秒的护盾，并移除受影响盟友的所有状态条件，并在护盾激活期间使他们免疫障碍。
Cn.WIGGLYTUFF_MOVE_STARLIGHT_RECITAL_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% CDR，20% 最大生命值护盾
